com.google.android.exoplayer.text

Interface SubtitleParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Mp4WebvttParser, SubripParser, TtmlParser, Tx3gParser, WebvttParser

    public interface SubtitleParser
    Parses Subtitles from a byte array.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canParse(String mimeType)
      Checks whether the parser supports a given subtitle mime type.
      Subtitle parse(byte[] bytes, int offset, int length)
      Parses a Subtitle from the provided byte[].

    • Method Detail

      • canParse

        boolean canParse(String mimeType)
        Checks whether the parser supports a given subtitle mime type.
        Parameters:
        mimeType - A subtitle mime type.
        Returns:
        Whether the mime type is supported.

      • parse

        Subtitle parse(byte[] bytes,
             int offset,
             int length)
               throws ParserException
        Parses a Subtitle from the provided byte[].
        Parameters:
        bytes - The array holding the subtitle data.
        offset - The offset of the subtitle data in bytes.
        length - The length of the subtitle data in bytes.
        Returns:
        A parsed representation of the subtitle.
        Throws:
        ParserException - If a problem occurred parsing the subtitle data.
